ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I just made 14 lastnight, so I don't know anything past the "first
stage" of an SK's life, but I'll try and help anyway, since you and I are in
the same stage.


> Tvar, on Povar. Dark Elf SK (Aren't we all?) To answer someone's
questions, and as an introduction. Still mostly in patchwork armor except
for the two pieces I have bought, one ring tunic and one banded wrist. Oh,
and I have a Studded Collar I bought, too. No magic weapon yet, despairing
of ever getting one....did finally buy a mino axe, though. I usually lead
with Siphon Strength as a pull, then Disease Cloud, then just whack, whack,
whack. Lather, rinse, repeat. And still hate runners.

That's all I do too. I do use the pet for an extra hit though.

> Having great difficulty in making it past 12th, STILL just one bubble into
it, after two weeks (but haven't played all that much since made 12th, been
real busy, so not THAT bad....) Currently over in South Karana, trying to
hunt in Paw, only moderately successfully. Kodies in the Commons, is that
all I have to look forward to?

Once you get 12th level, Dorn's dervish camp in North Ro becomes prime
hunting. At 12 you should have a few blues, plenty of whites (which you can
beat), and some yellows. The flagpole derv can be pulled alone, but the
other two in the camp are linked. It's a great spot for dark elves because
Dorn kills any light-siders that get too close or try to pull a derv. I've
been there since 12th level, and I'll be there till 15th. Go try it out. Go
into NRo, and his camp is over near the fishing village right on the water.

> What is BIBS? GZ? PGT?
> BBC = Bone-Bladed Claymore, that one I know. I carry both weapons, 1H and
2H, keep both skills maxxed out. Mostly I use the 2H, because of the
damage, and pull out the 1H when I know I am going to be fighting casters,
or end up fighting casters. (Have gotten pretty good at switching during
battle...) Lower delay on 1H means quicker attacks and maybe an
interruption or two with it, then, since they lowered Bash to 6th level, use
it to bash with shield and hopefully interrupt with it. Still just have a
plain shield, though. Was surprised at the mino axe, it does decent damage,
and runs about 3/4 of damage of my two-hander.

BIBS = Blackened Iron Bastard Sword, 2HS, 20 48.
GZ = Gigantic Zweihander, 2HS, 18 39
PGT = Polished Granite Tomahawk, 1HS, don't know stats, but it casts a
little temporary invulnerability number every now and again

> Pets. Anyone else a little disappointed in their pet? I was looking
forward to my pet SO much, and then when couldn't cast it at 9th, bummed.
So 10th comes around, and I have a pet out all the time. Because of the
half-level thing, I find one of two things: Either you are in an area where
your pet can survive most of the time, and thus you are getting no xps, -OR-
You are in an area where you are getting xps, and because the MOBS are much
higher than your pet, they just get blown away. Takes 2/3 of my mana, and
material components, and *piff*, there went Jananer. So, often I run around
with no pet now, just because it almost doesn't seem worth it. And because
of the train-ing factor, be careful if you plan to use them in a dungeon.
Best I can say, is that it almost replaces the warriors kick. Except theirs
is built in, and they don't have to summon and control it, and then resummon
it, and then med and summon it again. Is this what you all find at higher
levels as well, or does it get any better?

I summon a pet, give him a weapon, and then sit him down off to the side.
Then use siphon to pull mobs and lure them back to where your pet is. Do NOT
let the pet tank, he's suicidal and likes to try to, but don't let him. Keep
the mob on you, and just let him whack away alongside you. He doesn't hit
very often, but it's better than nothing.

> What about spells, what do you all think are the main spells to buy when
hit 15th, and then again at 22nd? Any we should DEFINITELY get, and others
we should probably avoid? How do you all best employ your spells? I gave
you my pretty much standard routine, Siphon, Cloud, Sword, with the spells I
have available now.

I'd like to know the answer to this one too.

> Any 'Knights on Povar, please post your names, and I will try to /tell you
from time to time, see what's up. Chris, you said you were on Povar, is
Barto your 'Knights name?

I'm on Fennin Ro.

Dravith (14)
